研究发现，智能手机成瘾会加剧孤独感并降低幸福感孤独如何调节过度使用智能手机或成瘾之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Smartphone-addiction-fuels-loneiness-and-reduces-well-being-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Smartphone-addiction-fuels-loneiness-and-reduces-well-being-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=827d0b35-f848-4e2d-880f-c78965993a0c Tue, 27 Feb 2024 06:55:00 -0500 Smartphone addiction fuels loneliness and reduces well-being, study finds
接近不健康的食物环境会增加心力衰竭的风险根据今天发表在美国心脏协会期刊《循环：心力衰竭》上的新研究，居住在酒馆、酒吧和快餐店附近可能会导致心力衰竭的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Proximity-to-unhealthy-food-environments-raises-heart-failure-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Proximity-to-unhealthy-food-environments-raises-heart-failure-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5e4588f-db0b-4589-bed3-3d7d1710ea18 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 06:37:35 -0500 Proximity to unhealthy food environments raises heart failure risk

政府视频将解释堕胎在南达科他州何时合法南达科他州立法者希望州政府官员制作一段教育视频，帮助医生了解何时可以终止妊娠，而不会因该州几乎全面禁止堕胎而面临入狱风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/A-government-video-would-explain-when-abortion-is-legal-in-South-Dakota.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/A-government-video-would-explain-when-abortion-is-legal-in-South-Dakota.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=291aaf6a-a69b-4123-8a43-aca88234f9ea Tue, 27 Feb 2024 05:57:41 -0500 A government video would explain when abortion is legal in South Dakota
